snippet: Corporate Commercial Bank will remain closed as officials continue to debate whether the state should bail it out or find private investors to rescue it.
abstract: Bulgarian officials fail to agree on rescue plan for country's Corporate Commercial Bank, which faces murky future after suffering a run in June; impasse has prolonged country's worst banking crisis since the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Corporate Commercial Bank will remain closed as officials continue to debate whether the state should bail it out or find private investors to rescue it.

headline.main: Plan to Rescue Troubled Bulgarian Bank Hits a Snag
headline.print_headline: Plan to Rescue Troubled Bulgarian Bank Hits a Snag
